meanings.definition: A plant of the pea family, native to East Asia, widely cultivated for its edible seeds.
meanings.sent1: The soya plant grows in East Asia and produces tasty seeds.
meanings.sent2: Farmers cultivate soya for its delicious and nutritious seeds.
meanings.sent3: Why did the soya plant go to the party? To show off its seeds!
meanings.sent4: The soya plant stands tall like a green beacon in the field.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the soya plant in bloom is unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A protein-rich substance derived from the seeds of the soya plant, used as a food product.
meanings.sent1: I added soya to my stir-fry for extra protein.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy the taste of soya in various dishes.
meanings.sent3: Why did the soya cross the road? To become a tasty meal!
meanings.sent4: Her strength was like soya, providing nourishment to those around her.
meanings.sent5: The soya in the dish added a satisfying texture and flavor.
